The best arancini i have had outside of Sicily, or one of my family member's kitchens

Chicken parm with "so much cheese that you don't need extra"
Custom pizza with sausage, peppers, onions and fresh ricotta! YUM!
Break was so good. And the butter was prewarmed (not frozen like many places)- it's the little things
Pizza Alla Vodka pizza. I can't get enough of it here!!
This is their marinara sauce, also very very tasty.
Meatball parmigiana hero & chicken parmigiana roll with ricotta
This is the bruschetta!!! And it's absolutely amazing!!!
Brussel Sprouts and Proscuitto di Parma - soo good and filling! During brunch
Eggplant And Zucchini Pizza with spicy sausage added
Amazing pizza & friendly service. I came her for brunch and definitely want to try their dinner pizza menu!
June 15 2017; Cremini mushrooms and fennel sausage in red sauce ($18).

Wood-Fired Garlic Bread, Meat & Cheese tray and Pepperoni Pizza

Classic pizza + topping of portabello mushrooms

The best!!! Spicy Buffalo Chicken 3.50 a must!!

Some of the nicest pie dudes behind the counter.  They ask you if you want your slice heated Medium Hot or Hot.
